dt-option.name: paging
dt-option.description:
This feature displays the pagination control next to the table, enabling the end user to change the page of data that is shown to them.
The `-feature paging` feature can be disabled completely using the `-init paging` option or by excluding it from the `-init layout` options (which is the preferred method as of DataTables 2).

example.title: Disable paging control with default layout
